name: Chuckie Egg (itch)
description: The 8-Bit classic comes flying onto your PC featuring all screens from the original Spectrum version, updated graphics, a Spectrum graphics mode and a special "Chuckie in the dark" mode. A lot of care has been taken to make the gameplay as close to the original as possible.  If that wasn't enough there are two brand new screen layouts for Henhouse Harry to negotiate. So, eyes on the prize and get collecting those eggs!
